creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: The Great Leader once again refers to American citizens protesting police brutality as “mob rule.” But we know where the real mob is, and we will never allow it to rule again. The true looting and plundering is done by white men in suits, not by the protesters in Philadelphia.
title: October 29, 2020: MOB RULE
